casebody.data:
PATRONELLI
v.
PATRONELLI. No. 55A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 22, 2006. Michael S. Harrell, Raleigh, for Carrie Patronelli. John M. Oliver, for Donald Patronelli. Celia Pistolis, Raleigh, for Legal Aid of NC. William D. Rowe, for N.C. Justice Center. Kenneth L. Schorr, Charlotte, for LSSP. Andrea Kurtz, for LAS. Christine O. Trottier, for CLA. Stella A. Boswell, for NCAWA.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of February 2006 by NC Bar Association for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of February 2006."
